title: Crackshot的问题
author: leo_322
txt_content: 有没有大神能给我分享用Crackshot做出来的近战武器,不是附件,是武器!

replies.txt_content:
举个栗子
 W_Knife:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&e小刀&r"
        Item_Type: 288
        Item_Lore: "&7类型: 武器|&3等级: 1|&b品质: 垃圾"
        Melee_Mode: true
        Sounds_Acquired: SHOOT_ARROW-1-0-0
    Shooting:
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 0
        Projectile_Damage: 8
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Hit: BLOCK_BREAK-55
    Hit_Events:
        Enable: true
        Sounds_Shooter: SHOOT_ARROW-1-0-0,SLIME_WALK-1-1-1
然后/cra get W_Knife 就可以

replies.author: leo_322
replies.txt_content:
1378495772 发表于 2016-4-18 17:40
